nodes.text: Narglatch AirTech was an airspeeder manufacturing company during the time prior to the Clone Wars. The company produced prefabricated kits, one such model being the XJ-6 airspeeder. While chasing the bounty hunter Zam Wesell through the city of Coruscant, Anakin Skywalker used a custom XJ-6 owned by a wealthy representative of the Vorzyd sector.
